resources.string: Send a package ID as input and will return a wordlist created by keywords extracted from different endpoints (eg. URLs, file paths) found in the APK.
Send a package ID as input and will return all the unique hosts found in the APK.
Send a package ID as input and will return all the S3 bucket URLs found in the APK.
Send a package ID as input and will return all of the assets such as URLs, Hostnames, IP Addresses, Emails, File Paths, Firebase URLs, S3 URLs, etc associated with that APK.
Send a package ID as input and will return a key-value pair of query parameters and values extracted from all the URLs found in the APK.
Send the domain name as input and will return all the Android apps which have the domain names mentioned in their APK.
Send a domain name as input and will return the subdomains of that domain.
Send a domain name(example: xvigil.com) as input and will return all of the URLs(example: xvigil.com/infra-monitor/web-apps?issue=) for that domain.
Send a keyword (example: Paytm) as input and will return all of the S3 URLs (example: https://s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/paytm-public/ ) for that keyword.
Check if your request is correct or try again after sometime.
